Scene:
The Temporary Mansion at Tsurugaoka
(Tsurugaoka kariya / 鶴が岡仮屋)

Play: The Adachi Plain in Oshu (奥州安達原)

Production: February 1973

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Miwatayū (竹本三輪大夫)

Takemoto Takatayū (竹本貴大夫)

Takemoto Tsukomadayū (竹本津駒大夫)

Takemoto Midoridayū (竹本緑大夫)

Toyotake Hanabusadayū III (豊竹英大夫 (三))



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Kanpei (鶴澤寛平)

Tsuruzawa Seitomo II (鶴澤清友 (二))

Nozawa Katsushi (see also Toyozawa Tomisuke V) (野澤勝司)

Tsuruzawa Katsunosuke (鶴澤勝之輔)



Performers:

Puppeteer Character Kashira
Yoshida Tamamatsu III (see also Kiritake Monya)
(吉田玉松 (三)) 		Yoshiie
(八幡太郎義家) 		Genta
(源太)
Yoshida Kunihide
(吉田国秀) 		Kagenari
(鎌倉権守景成) 		Kiichi
(鬼一)
Yoshida Tamakō II
(吉田玉幸 (二)) 		Shiro
(瓜割四郎糺) 		Yokanbei
(与勘平)
